typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		STORE_ID as string,
		WAREHOUSE_ID as string,
		WAREHOUSE_NAME as string,
		WAREHOUSE_COUNTRY as string,
		WAREHOUSE_STATE as string,
		WAREHOUSE_CITY as string,
		WAREHOUSE_STREET_NUMBER as string,
		WAREHOUSE_STREET_NAME as string,
		WAREHOUSE_STREET_TYPE as string,
		WAREHOUSE_ZIP as string,
		STORE_NAME as string,
		STORE_COUNTRY as string,
		STORE_COUNTY as string,
		STORE_STATE as string,
		STORE_CITY as string,
		STORE_STREET_NUMBER as string,
		STORE_STREET_NAME as string,
		STORE_ZIP as string,
		NUMBER_EMPLOYEES as string,
		WORKING_HOURS as string,
		MANAGER_NAME as string,
		SALES_PERSON_ID as string,
		SALES_PERSON_TYP as string,
		SALES_PERSON_TITLE as string,
		SALES_PERSON_FIRST_NAME as string,
		SALES_PERSON_LAST_NAME as string,
		SALES_PERSON_SUFFIX as string,
		SALES_PERSON_EMAIL_ADDRESS as string,
		SALES_PERSON_PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		SALES_PERSON_PHONE_NUMBER_TYPE as string,
		SALES_QUOTA as string,
		SALES_PERSON_BONUS as string,
		COMMISSION_PCT as string,
		SALES_YTD as string,
		SALES_LAST_YEAR as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SourceStore
source(output(
		HK_STORE_ID as binary,
		LOAD_DTS as timestamp,
		STORE_NAME as string,
		NUMBER_EMPLOYEES as integer,
		WORKING_HOURS as string,
		MANAGER_NAME as string,
		STREET_NUMBER as string,
		STREET_NAME as string,
		CITY as string,
		COUNTY as string,
		STATE as string,
		ZIP as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		REC_SRC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SATStoreSource
SourceStore select(mapColumn(
		STORE_ID,
		STORE_NAME,
		NUMBER_EMPLOYEES,
		WORKING_HOURS,
		MANAGER_NAME,
		STORE_STREET_NUMBER,
		STORE_STREET_NAME,
		STORE_CITY,
		STORE_COUNTY,
		STORE_STATE,
		STORE_ZIP,
		STORE_COUNTRY
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTransformation
SelectTransformation derive(HK_STORE_ID = md5Binary(STORE_ID),
		Datetime = currentDate(),
		RecordSource = "StoreInfo") ~> DataConversion
DataConversion, SATStoreSource exists(DataConversion@HK_STORE_ID == SATStoreSource@HK_STORE_ID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LoadNewRecordsOnly
LoadNewRecordsOnly sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		HK_STORE_ID as binary,
		LOAD_DTS as timestamp,
		STORE_NAME as string,
		NUMBER_EMPLOYEES as integer,
		WORKING_HOURS as string,
		MANAGER_NAME as string,
		STREET_NUMBER as string,
		STREET_NAME as string,
		CITY as string,
		COUNTY as string,
		STATE as string,
		ZIP as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		REC_SRC as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		STORE_ID,
		STORE_NAME,
		NUMBER_EMPLOYEES,
		WORKING_HOURS,
		MANAGER_NAME,
		STREET_NUMBER = STORE_STREET_NUMBER,
		STREET_NAME = STORE_STREET_NAME,
		CITY = STORE_CITY,
		COUNTY = STORE_COUNTY,
		STATE = STORE_STATE,
		ZIP = STORE_ZIP,
		HK_STORE_ID,
		LOAD_DTS = Datetime,
		REC_SRC = RecordSource,
		COUNTRY = STORE_COUNTRY
	)) ~> SatStore
